subject: World Cup (Basketball)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nneka Ogwumike and Jantel Lavender combined to make 14 of 15 field goal attempts and score 30 points to help the United States women’s national team beat China, 99-75, in an exhibition game in Paris.
snippet: Nneka Ogwumike and Jantel Lavender combined to make 14 of 15 field goal attempts and score 30 points to help the United States women’s national team beat China, 99-75, in an exhibition game in Paris.
